page.title: 03WEEKEND(CONT)-SWYDDFFYNNON
page.content: four o clock and we have a cup of tea and biscuits.At six o clock we all get tea ready and at seven o clock we have tea and listen to the radio.After tea we watch the television until half past nine because we have got school the next day. SWYDDFFYNNON In Swyddffynnon there are 24 houses.There are six council houses.In the first council house someone new has moved in.In the second house Mr and Mrs Williams live there.In the third one Mr and Mrs Thomas.In the fourth one Mr and Mrs Dimmack.In five Mrs Butcher and in the last one Mr and Mrs Latham.There are two chapels, in one of them we have our Eisteddfodau In the other one we had our harvest festival.One is a Baptist chapel,the other is a Methodist.There is one shop and post office.
